A C D G H I K M P S W 

A

AbstractCard - Class in heartstone
AbstractCard is an object that includes other Card objects.
Assassin - Class in heartstone
Assassin is a type of Card with some specifications in certain methods, also it defines the abstract method attack to work for the Assassin subclass.
Assassin(String, double, double) - Constructor for class heartstone.Assassin
Creates an Assassin card, initially the damage counter is 0.
attack(Card) - Method in class heartstone.AbstractCard
 
attack(Card) - Method in class heartstone.Assassin
applies the attackedByAssassin method to the Card, unless it is dead, in which case the method doesn't perform this action.
attack(Card) - Method in interface heartstone.Card
 
attack(Card) - Method in class heartstone.Druid
applies the attackedByDruid method to the Card, unless it is dead, in which case the method doesn't perform this action.
attack(Card) - Method in class heartstone.Healer
applies the attackedByHealer method to the Card, unless it is dead, in which case the method doesn't perform this action.
attack(Card) - Method in class heartstone.Hunter
applies the attackedByHunter method to the Card, unless it is dead, in which case the method doesn't perform this action.
attack(Card) - Method in class heartstone.Knight
applies the attackedByKnight method to the Card, unless it is dead, in which case the method doesn't perform this action.
attack(Card) - Method in class heartstone.Mage
applies the attackedByMage method to the Card, unless it is dead, in which case the method doesn't perform this action.
attack(Card) - Method in class heartstone.Paladin
applies the attackedByPaladin method to the Card, unless it is dead, in which case the method doesn't perform this action.
attack(Card) - Method in class heartstone.Shaman
applies the attackedByShaman method to the Card, unless it is dead, in which case the method doesn't perform this action.
attack(Card) - Method in class heartstone.Warlock
applies the attackedByWarlock method to the Card, unless it is dead, in which case the method doesn't perform this action.
attackedByAssassin(double) - Method in class heartstone.AbstractCard
 
attackedByAssassin(double) - Method in interface heartstone.Card
increases the damage counter of a Card by the Assassin's attack value.
attackedByAssassin(double) - Method in class heartstone.Healer
increases the damage counter of the Healer by double of the Assassin's attack value.
attackedByAssassin(double) - Method in class heartstone.Knight
increases the damage counter of the Knight by half of the Assassin's attack value.
attackedByAssassin(double) - Method in class heartstone.Mage
increases the damage counter of the Mage by double of the Assassin's attack value.
attackedByDruid(double) - Method in class heartstone.AbstractCard
 
attackedByDruid(double) - Method in class heartstone.Assassin
the damage counter of the Assassin remains the same, and increases the Assassin's attack by half of the Druid's attack value.
attackedByDruid(double) - Method in interface heartstone.Card
increases the damage counter of a Card by half of the Druid's attack value and increases the Card's attack by the Druid's attack value.
attackedByDruid(double) - Method in class heartstone.Hunter
Hunter's attack value remains the same, and increases the Assassin's damage counter by half of the Druid's attack value.
attackedByHealer(double) - Method in class heartstone.AbstractCard
 
attackedByHealer(double) - Method in interface heartstone.Card
restores the damage counter of a Card by half of the Healer's attack value, if the Card is dead, this action does not occurs.
attackedByHealer(double) - Method in class heartstone.Warlock
increases the damage counter of the Warlock by the Healer's complete attack value, instead of restoring it.
attackedByHunter(double) - Method in class heartstone.AbstractCard
 
attackedByHunter(double) - Method in interface heartstone.Card
increases the damage counter of a Card by the Hunter's attack value.
attackedByHunter(double) - Method in class heartstone.Knight
increases the damage counter of the Knight by double of the Hunter's attack value.
attackedByHunter(double) - Method in class heartstone.Shaman
increases the damage counter of the Shaman by double of the Hunter's attack value.
attackedByKnight(double) - Method in class heartstone.AbstractCard
 
attackedByKnight(double) - Method in interface heartstone.Card
increases the damage counter of a Card by the Knight's attack value.
attackedByKnight(double) - Method in class heartstone.Paladin
increases the damage counter of the Paladin by half of the Knight's attack value.
attackedByMage(double) - Method in class heartstone.AbstractCard
 
attackedByMage(double) - Method in interface heartstone.Card
increases the damage counter of a Card by the Mage's attack value.
attackedByMage(double) - Method in class heartstone.Hunter
increases the damage counter of the Hunter by double of the Mage's attack value.
attackedByMage(double) - Method in class heartstone.Paladin
increases the damage counter of the Paladin by double of the Mage's attack value.
attackedByPaladin(double) - Method in class heartstone.AbstractCard
 
attackedByPaladin(double) - Method in interface heartstone.Card
restores the damage counter of a Card by a third of the Paladin's attack value and increases the Card's attack by the same third of the Paladin's attack value.
attackedByPaladin(double) - Method in class heartstone.Druid
restores the damage counter of the Druid by two thirds of the Paladin's attack value and increases the Druid's attack by the same two thirds of the Paladin's attack value.
attackedByPaladin(double) - Method in class heartstone.Healer
restores the damage counter of the Healer by two thirds of the Paladin's attack value and increases the Healer's attack by the same two thirds of the Paladin's attack value.
attackedByShaman(double) - Method in class heartstone.AbstractCard
 
attackedByShaman(double) - Method in interface heartstone.Card
increases the damage counter of a Card by a third of the Shaman's attack value and diminishes the Card's attack by the same third of the Shaman's attack value.
attackedByShaman(double) - Method in class heartstone.Druid
increases the damage counter of the Druid by two thirds of the Shaman's attack value and diminishes the Druid's attack by the same two thirds of the Shaman's attack value.
attackedByShaman(double) - Method in class heartstone.Warlock
increases the damage counter of the Warlock by two thirds of the Shaman's attack value and diminishes the Warlock's attack by the same two thirds of the Shaman's attack value.
attackedByWarlock(double) - Method in class heartstone.AbstractCard
 
attackedByWarlock(double) - Method in class heartstone.Assassin
increases the damage counter of the Assassin by double of the Warlock's attack value.
attackedByWarlock(double) - Method in interface heartstone.Card
increases the damage counter of a Card by the Warlock's attack value.
attackedByWarlock(double) - Method in class heartstone.Mage
increases the damage counter of the Knight by half of the Warlock's attack value.
